item.title: Daily Lifestyle Checklist
item.description: A short guide to what I have found useful in my lifestyle over the past couple years based on the latest scientific evidence. Here is the checklist Further reading: How Not to Die The Telomere Effect Why Zebra’s Don’t Get Ulcers
